textAfterTable: Am learning a lot Every professor has life lessons to share, so even the gen eds are worth investing yourself in. Professors are knowledgeable and care. Login to rate or flag the reviews Rondell from New york, NY 02/05/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 7 out of 7 people found this review useful. 3 of 29 Categories Comments What to do for fun there is something for everything because of the diversity of clubs offered here. as well as being a ten minute drive or a purchase bus ride away from white plains which has three malls, many different restaurants and a train into new york city. Food and Dining the food is ok, its good for dorm food and the chefs here come up with some unique food combinations (like chicken and potato eggs) and theme days (wacky wing wednesday or ice cream friday). purchase college is also one of the top ten vegan friendly colleges
